Behringer Grind Semi-modular Hybrid Multi-engine Synthesizer (2).png

content.text:
[b][size=25]
- Added the Electric Pulse patch

- Redesigned the patch selector screen

- Added the visual patchbay to all loadable sheets

- Reduced scroll speed on the synth loading page

- Improved animations for the patchbay

- Updated resources on both the editor and loading pages

- Credits are now shown in the app

sprites.image: Behringer Grind Semi-modular Hybrid Multi-engine Synthesizer.png
Behringer Grind Semi-modular Hybrid Multi-engine Synthesizer (2).png

content.text:
[b][size=20]
General Info

Detail Button
Toggles visibility of knob and switch functions on the synth interface.

Patch Bay Button
Opens or closes the patch bay popup.
	•	In Editor Mode, you can select an input and output point to draw a “cable” between them.
	•	Pressing Return while hovering over the switch will clear all connections.
	•	In Loading Mode, patches are premade and no connections are needed. Hovering the cursor and holding return will temporarily hide patch points until released.

Patch Selector
	•	Clicking a patch opens the loading page to view its details and patch bay layout.
	•	Right-clicking a patch plays a preview of the selected sound.

Label.string: It displays the value when it changes.

content.text: It displays the value when it changes.
